bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks
Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks
Amendment: Priority-based Flow Control
IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks - Amendment: Priority-based Flow Control
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE P802.1Qbb/D2.3, May 2010 (DRAFT Amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q -2005)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment specifies protocols, procedures and managed objects that enable flowcontrol per traffic class on IEEE 802 point-to-point full duplex links. This is achieved by amechanism similar to the IEEE 802.3 Annex 31B PAUSE, but operating on individual priorities.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
